imdb.title: Junketsu no Maria
imdb.plot: Maria, the most powerful witch who lives during the Hundred Years' War in France. She despises war, so she obstructs battles with her strong magical powers. However not everyone loves her action, including the angel.

episodes.title: Perfect Virgin
episodes.plot: In the days long past, a girl sought to make the world a better place. She was a witch, and a virgin. The world she is about to weave has begun.

episodes.title: Against the World
episodes.plot: Warring continues, and Maria decides to enlist new help, but her actions to help dissolve conflict has now attracted attention from the heavens.

episodes.title: By Faith, Not Arms
episodes.plot: By Michael's words, Maria will lose her powers upon losing her virginity. With Ezekiel now in watch, a new figure decides to approach Maria.

episodes.title: Remember to Die
episodes.plot: A new witch appears in front of Maria, imparting a different view onto her situation. Meanwhile, Ezekiel ponders over Maria and her actions.

episodes.title: Courage, Prudence
episodes.plot: While Bernard works on his agenda, Joseph consults Maria in concern for Galfa's well-being. This brings more thoughts to Maria of her actions.

episodes.title: Under the Rose
episodes.plot: Those in opposition to Maria weigh their options, while a meeting with Joseph makes Maria question her next move when a huge battle breaks out.

episodes.title: War Feeds on War
episodes.plot: Maria steps in to intervene in the ensuing war. A major turn of events occur to Galfa on the battlefield, leading to a dark foreshadowing to come.

episodes.title: Man Is a Wolf to Man
episodes.plot: Rumors abound with Maria being faulted for the casualties of war. Bernard continues his agenda, and now approaches Ann's village to speak with Martha.

episodes.title: With a Grain of Salt
episodes.plot: Maria loses her magic and is captured for her inquisition. While Joseph and the others plan for her rescue, Bernard approaches Maria with interest.

episodes.title: I Hate and I Love
episodes.plot: Maria's friends go all out to save her before she is sentenced. Meanwhile, Joseph's return to battle leads to an encounter with Galfa.

episodes.title: If You Wish to Be Loved, Love
episodes.plot: Joseph and Galfa face each other in a bitter duel. Maria finally arrives on scene and what follows is something not even she could have expected.

episodes.title: Love Conquers All
episodes.plot: Amid a tense showdown against Archangel Michael, the final judgment of Mariaâ€ôs actions is passed and her ultimate fate revealed.
